Package taskmanager.model

Class TaskStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskmanager.model.TaskStore
  • public class TaskStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Intended for task storage and getting
    Corresponds to component model of MVC pattern
    See Also:
    Task, TaskSet
